emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Vic Miles, Dr. Robert Bolden, Patsy Ware, and Catherine Jackson, seated on stage in Crescent Elementary School for career conference
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 22, 1969, pg. 7 reads: "Career Conference - The Crescent Elementary School's sixth graders participated in their first Career Conference recently, under the supervision of Mrs. Louise B. Smith, coordinator. The conference ran from Tuesday through Friday with outstanding persons from various business and professional fields serving as panelists.  From left to right in the above picture: Vic Miles, KDKA-TV newscaster; Dr. Robert Bolden, dentist; Miss Patsy Ware, R.N. supervisor; Mrs. Catherine Jackson, L.P.N....-Harris photo."
